javadoc: Base class for various String constraints.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new StringColumnConstraint using the given pattern and patternString.

params.name: patternString
params.comment: the user entered string to form the pattern used to accept column values.

params.name: errorMessage
params.comment: the text to display in an empty editor textfield.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Constructs a new StringColumnConstraint using the given pattern and patternString, using
 the default hint text that explains that you can use globbing characters.

params.name: patternString
params.comment: the user entered string to form the pattern used to accept column values.

methods.name: copy
methods.comment: subclasses must override to generate new versions of themselves but with a new pattern string.

params.name: newPatternString
params.comment: the new string to use for creating the match pattern.

return.comment: a new ColumnConstraint that is the same type as this constraint but with a new range defined.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the pattern string for this constraint.
@return the pattern string for this constraint.
methods.name: getPatternString
methods.comment: Returns the pattern string for this constraint.

return.comment: the pattern string for this constraint.

name: StringColumnConstraint
comment: Base class for various String constraints.
